#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int palin(  int x,  int count);
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;    
   while(t--)
    { 
     int n; 
    scanf("%d",&n);                              
     int temp=5,j; 
     if(n==0)
     {printf("0\n");
     continue;}                 
    while(n>0)
    {     
     int count=0,r=0,k=0;                  
    r=palin(n,count);
    if(r==1)
    {       
      cout<<n<<"\n";
      break;
      }
     n++;
     }}
    return 0;
     }
int palin( int x, int count)
{ 
 int a[10],i=0;
 for(i=0;x!=0;i++)
  {   
   a[i]=x%10;
   x=x/10;
   count++;  
  }
 int flag;
int p=count;
for(i=0;i<(p+1)/2;i++)
{
   flag=1;                   
  //int w=count-1;    
  count--;
 if(a[i]!=a[count]) 
    {flag=0;      
   break;}
  // cout<<p<<count<<"\n";
 }
// cout<<flag<<"\n";
if(flag==1) 
return 1; 
else
return 0;
}
